replies.msg:
佢地係send個email
然後呃你話要verify 個email.
唔係就會收唔到同send唔到email
咁個網係email同password都要比佢囉

Sender address係可以扮, 未必真係嶺大send, 唔係間間公司有check SPF record

SPF record意思係DNS會指明個電郵domain會由邊o的IP send出黎, 唔係由指定IP send出會當spam或拒收

呢抽野係咪可以秒咗藍絲嘅文宣?

唔該一人一E-MAIL 叫ITSC 做野
itsc@LN.edu.hk

To whom which may concern:

Recently, we have received several spam e-mail, each of them are using different username but all under @ln.hk domain.

The recent address they are using is sflo@ln.hk

The spam mail contents a leaflet which is attached below:
https://na.cx/i/Gc2gWtC.jpg

I think that there are quite a lot of e-mail accounts were being hacked for spamming purpose.

Would you please investigate and stop these at once?

Thank you very much and please help to update me the progress.

Best regards,
XXXXXX
